metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6708 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege in the System UI in Android 7.0 before 2016-11-01could enable a local malicious user to bypass the security prompt of yourwork profile in Multi-Window mode. This issue is rated as High because itis a local bypass of user interaction requirements for any developer orsecurity setting modifications. Android ID: A-30693465.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
